com.bobman159.rundml.core.sql.serialize.impl

Class BaseSelectSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bobman159.rundml.core.sql.serialize.impl.SQLStatementSerializer
      • com.bobman159.rundml.core.sql.serialize.impl.BaseSelectSerializer

  • public class BaseSelectSerializer
extends SQLStatementSerializer
    Base class to serialize SQL SELECT statements for most databases.
